greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n + 2 - a(n-1) for n>1; a(1) = 0.
comment: Interleaving of A001477 and A000027 without first three terms.
Binomial transform of 0, 4 followed by a signed version of A005009.
Inverse binomial transform of A034007 without first and third term.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) - a(n-3). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 08 2014
mathematica: a=3; Table[a=n-a, {n, 3, 200}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 22 2009 *)
CoefficientList[Series[x (4 - 3 x) / ((1 + x) (1 - x)^2),{x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 16 2013 *)
program: (MAGMA) [ n eq 1 select 0 else -Self(n-1)+n+2: n in [1..75] ];
xref: Cf. A001477 (nonnegative integers), A000027 (positive integers), A168309 (repeat 4,-3), A005009 (7*2^n), A034007 (first differences of A045891).
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2009
ext: Edited, three comments, four formulas, MAGMA program added by _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 22 2009
